## TextfieldProps interface

Props of the [Textfield](./react-native-material-kit.textfield.md) component

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TextfieldProps extends TextInputProps, FloatingLabelPublicProps, UnderlinePublicProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [additionalInputProps](./react-native-material-kit.textfieldprops.additionalinputprops.md) | <code>TextInputProps</code> | Additional props passed directly to the react native <code>TextInput</code> component |
|  [highlightColor](./react-native-material-kit.textfieldprops.highlightcolor.md) | <code>any</code> | Color of the highlighted underline, and also the floating label |
|  [onTextChange](./react-native-material-kit.textfieldprops.ontextchange.md) | <code>(text: string) =&gt; void</code> | alias to <code>onChangeText</code> |
|  [password](./react-native-material-kit.textfieldprops.password.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Alias to <code>secureTextEntry</code> |
|  [textInputStyle](./react-native-material-kit.textfieldprops.textinputstyle.md) | <code>StyleProp&lt;TextStyle&gt;</code> | Style applied to the <code>TextInput</code> component, ok to use <code>StyleSheet</code> |
|  [tint](./react-native-material-kit.textfieldprops.tint.md) | <code>any</code> | Color of the un-highlighted underline, and the placeholder - TODO cursor color is not affected for now  https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues/1685 |
